headline: 5 Hospital Stocks Set to Thrive Amid Robust Industry Trends
summary: The Zacks Medical-Hospital industry is likely to gain from rising patient admissions and technological advancements. Companies like HCA, THC, UHS, ACHC and CYH are poised to gain from these trends.

headline: HCA Healthcare Named a Best Employer for Veterans by Military Times for Fifth Consecutive Year
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., November 11, 2024--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that it has been recognized for the fifth consecutive year as a Best for Vets Employer by Military Times for its efforts to recruit, mentor and retain U.S. service members. HCA Healthcare has hired more than 65,000 veterans, active-duty and reserve personnel and military spouses since 2012.
